tech_demo

Class ScrollingText

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • tech_demo.TechDemo
        • tech_demo.ScrollingText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class ScrollingText
extends TechDemo
implements java.util.Observer
    This class implements a way to display text on the Launchpad S.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion
